typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		PARENT_TARGET_CODE as string,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> VCrossReference
source(output(
		FROM_CURRENCY_ID as double,
		TO_CURRENCY_ID as double,
		EXCHANGE_FROM_DATE as timestamp,
		EXCHANGE_RATE as decimal(38,18),
		EXCHANGE_TO_DATE as timestamp,
		FROM_CURRENCY_CODE as string,
		TO_CURRENCY_CODE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> TCrossReference
VCrossReference, TCrossReference union(byName: true)~> TVCrossRefCOUNTRY
VCrossReference, TCrossReference union(byName: true)~> TVCrossRefREGION
COUNTRY50, FilterREGION219 join(TVCrossRefCOUNTRY@PARENT_TARGET_CODE == TVCrossRefREGION@PARENT_TARGET_CODE
	&& TVCrossRefCOUNTRY@PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID == TVCrossRefREGION@PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1COUNTRYogREGION
Join1COUNTRYogREGION, FilterAREA219 join(TVCrossRefCOUNTRY@PARENT_TARGET_CODE == TVCrossRefAREA@TARGET_CODE
	&& TVCrossRefCOUNTRY@PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID == TVCrossRefAREA@CODE_TYPE_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinCtryRegArea
TVCrossRefREGION filter(CODE_TYPE_ID==219) ~> FilterREGION219
TCrossReference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID==219) ~> FilterAREA219
TVCrossRefCOUNTRY filter(CODE_TYPE_ID==50) ~> COUNTRY50
VCrossReference, TCrossReference union(byName: true)~> TVCrossRefREGA
TVCrossRefREGA filter(CODE_TYPE_ID==374) ~> FilterREGIONA374
TVCrossRefREGION filter(CODE_TYPE_ID==367) ~> FilterREGION367
COUNTRY50, TVCrossRefREGA join(TVCrossRefCOUNTRY@PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
TVCrossRefCOUNTRY filter(CODE_TYPE_ID==219) ~> AREA219
